vehicles.description: Multiple vehicles ahead with red taillights visible, indicating that they are either slow-moving or stationary.
vehicles.explanation: The ego vehicle must maintain a safe distance and be prepared to stop if the vehicles ahead are not moving.

traffic lights.description: A traffic light ahead displaying red at a distance, merged with the taillights of other vehicles.
traffic lights.explanation: The ego car must stop at the traffic light until it turns green.

barriers.description: Temporary barriers on the left side of the lane, narrowing the drivable area.
barriers.explanation: The ego vehicle should stay to the right and reduce speed to navigate the narrowed space safely.

general_perception.description and explanation: In the traffic image, there are multiple vehicles ahead with red taillights visible, indicating that they are either slow-moving or stationary. The ego vehicle must maintain a safe distance and be prepared to stop if the vehicles ahead are not moving. A traffic light ahead is displaying red at a distance, merged with the taillights of other vehicles, which means the ego car must stop at the traffic light until it turns green. Additionally, there are temporary barriers on the left side of the lane, narrowing the drivable area. The ego vehicle should stay to the right and reduce speed to navigate the narrowed space safely.

1.description and explanation: This object is a large truck, visible from behind, traveling along the same road as the ego car. It has multiple visible rear lights, likely including taillights and brake lights, which are illuminated. The size and nature of the truck suggest it could be slower-moving and may require a longer distance to stop due to its mass, affecting the driving behavior of the ego car by necessitating increased following distance and heightened awareness for sudden stops or turns made by the truck.

driving_suggestion: Proceed with caution, reduce speed to account for potential changes in traffic flow due to the stopped or slow-moving vehicles ahead, and be prepared to come to a complete stop at the traffic light. Keep to the right to avoid the temporary barriers while navigating the narrowed space.
